roleset.name: make very very clean
roleset.note: SANITATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on sanitize-v.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from sanitation.01-n)

example.name: active
example.text: Many larger egg producers are also egg processors, who [*T*-1] crack, inspect, and sanitize billions of eggs, turning them into powdered, liquified or frozen egg products.
example.arg: turning them into powdered, liquified or frozen egg products

example.name: passive
example.text: The Egg King carries written instructions to break only high-grade eggs that [*T*-3]-1 have been properly sanitized [*-1]and, as an added precaution, to use the eggs only in products that will be cooked enough to kill bacteria.

example.name: both args
example.text: The MSU team was completing their sanitation of surgery tables and cages
example.arg: of the surgery tables and cages
